verses.name: 1 Samuel 2:10
verses.text: The adversaries of the Lord shall be broken to pieces; out of heaven shall he thunder upon them: the Lord shall judge the ends of the earth; and he shall give strength unto his king, and exalt the horn of his anointed.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 2:11
verses.text: And Elkanah went to Ramah to his house. And the child did minister unto the Lord before Eli the priest.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 2:12
verses.text: Now the sons of Eli were sons of Belial; they knew not the Lord.
